Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 37th overall pick, by Baltimore in 1970...
Injured on 4/20/1970 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 5/12/1971 with a Ruptured Disc Back, out for entire career...

Injured on 7/8/1977 with a Strained Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 5/5/1978 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Released by Baltimore on 4/26/1979...
Drafted in 3rd round, 47th overall pick, by Oakland in 1985...
Injured on 8/18/1986 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Injured on 9/2/1986 with a Bruised Hand, out for 5 days...
Injured on 8/11/1987 with a Stiff Neck, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/1/1989, off Frank Viola (BOS)...
Hit for the cycle against Baltimore on 4/4/1990...
Drove in 6 runs against Baltimore on 4/4/1990...
Won Gold Glove Award at Leftfield in 1990...
